Class Node<R extends State>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdd.Node<R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Node> 

    public class Node<R extends State>
extends Object
implements Comparable<Node>
    Represents a particular node of the MDD.
    Author:
    Vianney Copp√©

      • Node

        public Node(R state,
            Variable[] variables,
            int[] indexes,
            double value,
            boolean exact)
        Parameters:
        state - the state representation in the dynamic programming approach
        variables - the variables of this node
        indexes - the index of each variable indexed by their id
        value - the value of the objective function at this point
        exact - a boolean telling if the node is exact or not

      • getSuccessor

        public Node getSuccessor(State state,
                         double value,
                         int id,
                         int val)
        Utility function to build a new node from this one, with one more variable bound.
        Parameters:
        state - the State for the successor node
        value - the value for the successor node
        id - the id of the variable to bind
        val - the value to bind to the variable chosen
        Returns:
        a new node with the internal properties required to be the successor of this node
